welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sorriso, Brazil! Get ready to experience the charm of the "City of Happiness," known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Sorriso has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Pim Pão
restaurants.description: Pim Pão is a bakery located in Sorriso.
restaurants.address: Av. Natalino J. Brescansin, 1763, Centro Norte, Sorriso, MT, 78890-000
